ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 2: Black Sun Rising
ComicInfo.Summary: Allied with the powerful Agallite knights of the Middle Kingdoms and brigand bands from the hills, Branimir succeeds in forcing two of Artesia's loyal captains to desert her before the great battle. Despite her talents, Artesia may find herself outmatched. Under a dim sky illuminated by the ominous Black Sun, Artesia and her troops burn the wolf banner of their king and storm the field to face Branimir as an enemy...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-15 13:36:49. [CVDB93768]
ComicInfo.Characters: Argante, Artesia, Bela, Branimir, Demetrius, Ferris, Gavant, Gawin, Harcas, Jeffers, Korovic, Lycus, Lysia, Pavel, Ulin, Umasza, Vaslav, Yerwin
